description: Expected results for simple ReqRet test

expected_messages.description: Start message should be sent successfully
First data message (seq=0) should be sent successfully
Second data message (seq=2, skipping seq=1) should be sent successfully
End message should trigger ReqRet for missing seq=1
Retransmitted data message (seq=1) should be sent successfully
Second end message should receive end_ack since all sequences are complete

validation_rules.session_consistency: All messages should use the same session ID
validation_rules.message_order: Messages should be sent in the correct order with proper gaps
validation_rules.response_format: Start and End should receive responses, ReqRet should be sent when gaps detected
validation_rules.reqret_detection: Manager should detect missing sequence 1 and send ReqRet
